body: @myiasis No problem but be sure to proof read it to maintain quality if you want to give credits use the name in the blog

@nav89 
I'll typeset it for you then, if you don't mind.

this is the english translation done by me (only transcript not  scanlation)  feel free to use it if you can't wait for scanlation ( no one knows when that will happen) or if you want to scanlate it(like running short of translators.)
How can you NOT tag Konno Yuuki!?
